summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the regulation of massage premises; providing certain exemptions from the application of the ordinance; reducing the license fee for massage premises; amending Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Sections 6.36.010, 6.36.020, 6.36.030, 6.36.050, 6.36.060, 6.36.070, 6.36.080, 6.02.190, and repealing SMC Section 6.36.040.
